mapper.select: SELECT report_history.ID,AWARD_TIME,report_history.CREATE_TIME,TerminalID,TICKET_ID,TOTAL, operator.OPERTOR_NAME, item_game_class.ID as IID,ITEM_GAME,SECO_VAULE,ITEM_GAME_VAULE,game_class.GAME_VAULE FROM report_history LEFT OUTER JOIN operator on report_history.OPERTOR_ID = operator.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN item_game_class ON report_history.ID=item_game_class.REPORT_HISTORY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN game_class ON item_game_class.GAME_KEY = game_class.GAME_KEY WHERE report_history.ADMIN_ID =#{adminID}

SELECT R.ID as id, R.AWARD_TIME AS AWARD_TIME, R.CREATE_TIME AS operatorCreateTime, R.TerminalID AS terminalID, R.TICKET_ID AS ticketID, R.TOTAL AS total, O.OPERTOR_NAME as operatorName, (SELECT count(*) FROM item_game_class WHERE R.ID =item_game_class.REPORT_HISTORY_ID) AS gameSize FROM report_history R LEFT OUTER JOIN operator O ON R.OPERTOR_ID =O.ID WHERE R.ADMIN_ID =#{adminID}

SELECT I.ID as id, I.OPERTOR_ID as operatorID , I.REPORT_HISTORY_ID as reportHistoryID , I.ITEM_GAME as itemGame , I.SECO_VAULE AS secoValue, I.ITEM_GAME_VAULE AS itemGameValue, I.GAME_KEY AS gameKey, O.OPERTOR_NAME as operatorName, G.GAME_VAULE as gameName FROM item_game_class I LEFT OUTER JOIN operator O ON I.OPERTOR_ID = O.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN game_class G ON I.GAME_KEY = G.GAME_KEY WHERE I.ADMIN_ID = #{id} AND I.GAME_KEY = #{type}
